feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-22T12:00:55.429536Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Plane – 开源 Jira 替代方案</stitle>; <id>;https://plane.so</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T08:59:55.487949Z</updated>; <link href="https://plane.so"/>; <author>; <name>;prhrb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prhrb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://plane-marketing.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/plane-assets/icons/youtube.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 162px; ” />;<br />;开源项目管理工具，可安心管理问题、冲刺和产品路线图。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#plane-open-source-jira-alternative" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824450" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Octos – HTML 动态壁纸引擎</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/underpig1/octos</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T08:59:55.489281Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/underpig1/octos"/>; <author>; <name>;underpig1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =underpig1</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/underpig1/octos/master/img/tray.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;在 Windows 上创建、分发和探索使用 HTML、CSS 和 JS 制作的实时交互式壁纸。 Octos 目前处于开发的早期阶段。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#octos-html-live-wallpaper-engine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824595" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;ElKaWe – 电热热泵</stitle>; <id>;https://www.fraunhofer.de/en/research/lighthouse-projects-fraunhofer-initiatives/fraunhofer-lighthouse-projects/elkawe.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T05:59:55.490418Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.fraunhofer.de/ en/research/lighthouse-projects-fraunhofer-initiatives/fraunhofer-lighthouse-projects/elkawe.html"/>; <author>; <name>;danans</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=danans</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.fraunhofer.de/en/research/lighthouse-projects-fraunhofer-initiatives/ fraunhofer-lighthouse-projects/elkawe/jcr:content/stage/stageParsys/stage_slide/image.img.jpg/1574244502657/ElKaWe-KV-web.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 84px;" />;<br />;ElKaWe 灯塔项目旨在开发比传统压缩机热泵更高效、更环保的电热热泵。科学家们正在研究陶瓷和聚合物基电热材料以及高效散热的创新系统方法。该项目旨在展示电热热泵长期替代压缩机的潜力。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elkawe-electriccaloric-heat-pump s" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823524" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Apple 的交互式电视盒：破解 ROM 中的机顶盒 System 7.1</stitle >; <id>;http://oldvcr.blogspot.com/2023/07/apples-interactive-television-box.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T05:59:55.491355Z</更新>; <link href="http://oldvcr.blogspot.com/2023/07/apples-interactive-television-box.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;tods acerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgT5ldv1fTGlQrFwP9YvESyKNAoqxHlTII0uFm4NYQRJ8gvKaG vGh0Y-2mgZNL9w-TNhZFhb77W_OvZDlmPvrRHmvLf4xlIUXLH7BbsJuOEtCPRKP3-6T3W6rUgrGEo7FDsFNujaetgxrK0BHIovLKHTwsW6njPPheMKDQFNUAv33t3jrMOxvq3HO8Ez8U/s320/PXL_ 20230709_004451960.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 166px;" />;<br />;Apple 交互式电视盒 (AITB) 是 Apple 在 20 世纪 90 年代开发的一款机顶盒。它设计为在 T1/E1 线路或 CD 上运行，基于 Quadra 605 硬件。但是，AITB 从未推出零售，大多数设备都被召回和销毁。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-s-interactive-television- box-hacking-the-set-top-box-system-7-1-in-rom" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823565" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MSX- DOS</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MSX-DOS</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T08:59:55.494086Z</更新>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MSX-DOS"/>; <作者>; <name>;pavlov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pavlov</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;MSX-DOS 是 Microsoft 为 8 位家用计算机标准 MSX 开发的已停产的磁盘操作系统。它是 MS-DOS v1.25 和 CP/M-80 v2.2 之间的交叉版本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#msx-dos" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797650" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;放置CPU中的“你”</stitle>; <id>;https://cpu.land/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T05:59:55.495016Z</updated>; <link href="https://cpu.land/"/>; <author>; <name>;uneekname</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=uneekname</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://cpu.land/orpheus-flag.svg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;作者对程序在计算机上运行时发生的情况的了解存在差距。他们进行了研究，现在对计算机从启动到程序执行的工作方式有了更好的了解。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#putting-the-you-in-cpu" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823605" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Llama：添加基于语法的采样</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T21:59:55.495928Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773"/>; <author>; <name>;davepeck</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=davepeck</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2420543/250365685-5bd15da2-78c1-4625-be90-1e938e6823f1.gif" style="width: 220px; height : 110 像素;" />;<br />;本文介绍了一个 API，它采用序列化的上下文无关语法来指导和约束采样。它还提供了一个类似 Backus-Naur 形式 (BNF) 的语法示例，用于指定生成的语法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama-add-grammar-based-sampling" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36819906" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;互联网搜索提示</stitle>; <id>;https://gwern.net/search</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T03:59:55.496837Z</updated>; <link href="https://gwern.net/search"/>; <author>; <name>;herbertl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=herbertl</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://gwern.net/doc/technology/google/gwern-googlesearch-tools-daterange.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：145px；" />;<br />;随着时间的推移，我在网上查找参考文献、论文和书籍方面积累了一定的谷歌能力和专业知识。其中一些技巧并不为人所知，例如在互联网档案馆 (IA) 中查找书籍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#internet-search-tips" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822880" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;当我们谈论系统设计时，我们在谈论什么</stitle>; <id>;https://maheshba.bitbucket.io/blog/2023/07/12/Design.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T04:59:55.498708Z</updated>; <link href="https://maheshba.bitbucket.io/blog/2023/07/12/Design.html"/>; <author >; <name>;scv119</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=scv119</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;用抽象来对抗复杂性的设计过程对于解决现实世界的问题是有效的。设计的后期绑定、讨论设计空间以及并行设计和开发过程是需要遵循的关键规则。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-we-talk-about-when-we-talk-about-system-design" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823375" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;图表中的 AWS 网络概念</stitle>; <id>;https://miparnisariblog.wordpress.com/2023/03/29/aws-networking-concepts/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T05:59:55.499646Z</updated>; <link href="https://miparnisariblog.wordpress.com/2023/03/2 9/aws-networking-concepts/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mparnisari</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mparnisari</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miparnisariblog.files.wordpress.com/2023/03/image.png?w=1024" style="width: 220px; height: 201px; ” />;<br />;本文讨论了作者为理解 AWS VPC 仪表板所做的努力以及他们为了解网络资源所做的努力。他们发现 AWS 中可能存在多种类型的连接。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#aws-networking-concepts-in-a-diagram" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823516" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;Bun v0.7.0</stitle>; <id>;https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v0.7.0</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T06:59:55.501601Z</updated>; <link href="https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v0.7.0"/>; <author>; <name>;sshroot</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=sshroot</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/709451/254804727-725bf67c-c60f-4eec-b472-07d52b650a93.gif" style="宽度：220px；高度：143px；" />;<br />;Bun v0.7.0 在 Node.js 兼容性方面是一个巨大的飞跃。它是一个令人难以置信的快速 JavaScript 运行时、捆绑器、转译器和包管理器。 Bun 现在支持 Worker，实现 AsyncLocalStorage，并为内存受限环境提供了一个新的 CLI 标志 --smol。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bun-v0-7-0" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823723" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;压力和真空腌制不起作用（2016）</stitle>; <id>;https://genuineideas.com/ArticlesIndex/Pressuremarinade.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T01:59:55.502627Z</updated>; <link href="https://genuineideas.com/ArticlesIndex/Pressuremarinade.html"/>; <author>; <name>;OJFord</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=OJFord</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://genuineideas.com/Assets/imageassets/incompressible_matrix.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 121px;" />;<br />;压力和真空腌制对肉类不起作用。肉几乎是不可压缩的，并且没有空的气孔，因此不可能将腌料拉入内部。真空腌泡特别无效，因为当肉基质收缩时，在真空步骤中吸入的任何腌泡汁都会被排出。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#Pressure-and-vacuum-marination-does-not-work-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783937" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 Windows NT 网络配置中使用 Prolog (1996)</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20030218034509/http://www.research.microsoft.com/research/dtg/davidhov/pap.htm</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:59:55.503 548Z</updated>; <link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20030218034509/http://www.research.microsoft.com/research/dtg/davidhov/pap.htm"/>; <author>; <name>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;微软的 Windows NT 操作系统使用嵌入式 Prolog 解释器来配置其局域网和广域网系统。描述了解决管道问题的算法，包括其正向和负向约束、Prolog 数据库和效率考虑。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#using-prolog-in-windows-nt-network-configuration-1996" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821871" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;将失败作为核心生活技能</stitle>; <id>;https://buildinghealthier.substack.com/p/confronting-failure-as-a-core-life</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:59:55.504490Z</updated>; <link href="https://buildinghealthier.substack.com/p/confronting-failure-as -a-core-life"/>; <作者>; <名称>;blh75</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=blh75</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media。 s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F627efde7-8e44-414c-9cf3-32ba9d1649c4_3223x4000.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：274px；" />;<br />;一年前，作者在旧金山工作，但现在他们在越南反思他们失败的数字健康公司。他们过去常常针对有关自己失败的问题制定类似营销活动的回应，但现在他们抓住了就此进行真诚对话的机会。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#confronting-failure-as-a-core-life-skill" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784114" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;发现：金属可以自我修复</stitle>; <id>;https://newsreleases.sandia.gov/healing_metals/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T02:59:55.506356Z</updated>; <link href="https://newsreleases.sandia.gov/healing_metals/"/>; <author>; <name>;bobvanluijt</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bobvanluijt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://newsreleases.sandia.gov/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/CFB1795-scaled.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;科学家观察到金属碎片在没有人为干预的情况下破裂并重新融合在一起，这对科学理论提出了挑战。如果这种现象能够被利用，它可能会导致发动机、桥梁和飞机的自我修复，从而使它们更安全、更耐用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#discovery-metals-can-heal-themselves" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822530" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;用恐怖小店管理厨房果蝇</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.zaccohn.com/Fruitflies-and-the-Little-Shop-of-Horrors/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:59:55.508194Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.zaccohn.com/Fruitflies-and-the -Little-Shop-of-Horrors/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;zacharycohn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zacharycohn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.zaccohn.com/images/blog_pitcherplants.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;每年夏天，作者的厨房尽管定期清洁，但果蝇却出没。他们尝试使用陷阱，但发现它们难看。然后他们发现了肉食性猪笼草，特别是紫猪笼草，它可以有效控制果蝇的数量。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#managing-kitchen-fruit-flies-with-a-little-shop-of-horrors" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820469" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bfs 3.0：迄今为止最快的查找</stitle>; <id>;https://tavianator.com/2023/bfs_3.0.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:59:55.510082Z</updated>; <link href="https://tavianator.com/2023/bfs_3.0. html"/>; <author>; <name>;rurban</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rurban</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Bfs 3.0 是一个通过文件系统进行广度优先搜索的工具。新版本包括异步、并行目录遍历，使其比以前的版本和 GNU find 更高效、更快。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bfs-3-0-the-fastest-find-yet" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783449" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FBI 对美国参议员不当使用 702 监视权力</stitle>; <id>;https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/4110850-fbi-improperly-used-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T02:59:55.510998Z</update d>; <link href="https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/4110850-fbi-improperly-used-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator/"/>; <作者>; <name>;ramblenode</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ramblenode</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com /thehill.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2023/07/AP910776172115-e1689375358323.jpg?w=2000&ssl=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;根据法庭记录，联邦调查局不当使用监视权力来搜查有关美国参议员、州议员和州法官的信息。外国情报监视法院 (FISC) 的意见中记录了 FBI 对《外国情报监视法》第 702 条的使用，这肯定会给情报界带来挑战。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fbi-improperly-used-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822654" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NativePHP：使用 PHP 构建桌面应用程序的框架</stitle>; <id>;https://nativephp.com/docs/1/getting-started/introduction</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:59:55.511899Z</updated>; <link href="https://nativephp.com/docs/1/getting-started/intro duction"/>; <author>; <name>;brysonreece</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=brysonreece</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;NativePHP 是一个新框架，用于使用 PHP 快速构建丰富的本机桌面应用程序。它使 PHP 开发人员能够使用熟悉的工具和技术创建跨平台的本机应用程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nativephp-a-framework-for-building-desktop-apps-using-php" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820555" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;受损的 Microsoft 密钥：比我们想象的影响更大</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wiz.io/blog/storm-0558-compromished-microsoft-key-enables-authentication-of-countless-micr</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T03:59:55.512888Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.wi z.io/blog/storm-0558-compromished-microsoft-key-enables-authentication-of-countless-micr"/>; <author>; <name>;882542F3884314B</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=882542F3884314B</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.dato cms-assets.com/75231/1689885318-research_blog_post_cover.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Microsoft 和 CISA 披露了一起安全事件，威胁行为者获取了私有加密密钥，并用它来伪造 Outlook Web Access 和 Outlook.com 的访问令牌。泄露的密钥比最初想象的更强大，允许威胁参与者伪造多种类型的 Azure Active Directory 应用程序的访问令牌。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#compromished-microsoft-key-more-impactful-than-we-thought" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823007" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;书评：交易法则</stitle>; <id>;https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/your-book-review-the-laws-of-trading</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T21:59:55.513820Z</updated>; <link href="https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/your-book-review- the-laws-of-trading"/>; <author>; <name>;feross</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=feross</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post- media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F4c83fb0a-dce8-47ca-9dd7-276236fa4a69_1200x742.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：137px；" />;<br />;奥古斯丁·勒布朗的《交易法则》是一本结合了交易、哲学和决策的独特书籍。勒布朗将金融市场视为一个竞争环境，参与者必须适应，否则就会死亡。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#book-review-the-laws-of-trading" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820105" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;“最好的蓝莓”：一种微小的北美水果如何占领澳大利亚（2022 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/food/2022/oct/29/the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T23:59:55.514824 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/food/2022/oct/29/the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia"/>; <作者>; <name>;calf</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=calf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim .co.uk/img/media/b26d00b62f1ebbeb299aaa2647c209a93f708c0c/0_203_6016_3610/master/6016.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;澳大利亚培育的蓝莓品种尤里卡 (Eureka) 荣获三星级高级口味奖。过去五年，澳大利亚的蓝莓产量增加了两倍，而且几乎全年种植。蓝莓已成为一种需求量很大的流行超级食品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797636" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;员工对 Anchor Brewery 出价</stitle>; <id>;https://vinepair.com/booze-news/anchor-employees-brewery-takeover-bid/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:59:55.515863Z</updated>; <link href="https://vine pair.com/booze-news/anchor-employees-brewery-takeover-bid/"/>; <author>; <name>;selimthegrim</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=selimthegrim</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://vinepair.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/anchor-bottle-card-3 75x450.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：264px；" />;<br />;在高管宣布这家历史悠久的旧金山公司将被关闭后，Anchor Brewing Co. 的员工表达了购买该啤酒厂并将其作为工人合作社经营的愿望。员工们要求有公平的机会继续工作并保持啤酒厂的运营。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#employees-bid-on-anchor-brewery" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821861" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
